tags.name: sd-textfield
tags.description: Text field capable of persisting `string` values to Stream Deck settings.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Determines whether the input is disabled; default `false`.

attributes.name: global
attributes.description: When `true`, the setting will be persisted in the global settings, otherwise it will be persisted in the action's settings; default `false`.

attributes.name: setting
attributes.description: Path to the setting where the value should be persisted, for example `name`.

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description: Maximum length the value can be.

attributes.name: pattern
attributes.description: Optional pattern to be applied when validating the value.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Optional placeholder text to be shown within the input.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Determines whether a value is required.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of text field; either `password` or `text`; default `text`.
